channel.title: admin on Digital space of K. Bret Staudt Willet
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Digital space of K. Bret Staudt Willet

item.description: Hi, I’m Bret. Read my CV, download a PDF copy, or download a two-page resume version. I am a Ph.D. candidate in Educational Psychology & Educational Technology at Michigan State University. My work is interdisciplinary. I research networked learning at the intersection of instructional technology, educational psychology, and information science. My scholarship investigates learning analytics of the ways people connect, participate, and learn in and through the novel social and environmental conditions afforded by the Internet.
